providerData.title: All Mecha anime openings in collection from the 1980s
providerData.description:
An almost complete collection of giant robot anime TV openings from the 1980s

I finally found out who the author of this great collection is:
A group called "Anime in Action".
Below the full List of Animes in this Video!

Invincible Robo / Muteki Robo Trider G7            0:00:05
Space Emperor / Uchuu Daitei God Sigma     0:01:36
